TenantSecurityTransactionPolicyTrend.name: TenantSecurityTransactionPolicyTrend
TenantSecurityTransactionPolicyTrend.description: Stores changes to the count of Transaction Security Policies for a connected tenant within Security Center.

Action.description: Stores information on a change to the policy. Available options include: ADDED REMOVED UPDATED

ActionBy.description: The name of the person who made this change.

ActionConfig.description: Contains a JSON description for how a user is alerted to an action on the policy. For example: In-app Email

DetailIdentifier.description: Unique identifier for this detail record.

EventName.description: The name of the event of the corresponding Transaction Security Policy.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the corresponding TenantSecurityMonitorMetric.

MetricsType.description: The type of metric for the data collected.

Name.description: The name of the metric for the data collected.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant (org) that this record is for.

TenantName.description: The name of the tenant (org) that this record is for.

TransactionPolicyState.description: The state of the transaction security policy. The possible states are ENABLED or DISABLED.

TransactionPolicyType.description: The type of policy configured. The available types are standard policy or a custom Apex policy.
